FuncDef: This command specifies the local ID of the 7750 SR used for IDi or IDr for IKEv2 tunnels. The local-id can only be changed or removed when tunnel or gateway is shutdown.
CLIs: local-id type { ipv4 | fqdn | ipv6 } [ value [ value ] ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the type of local ID payload, it could be ipv4 address/FQDN domain name. Values-ipv4 - Use ipv4 as the local ID type, the default value is the local tunnel end-point address..
Specifies the value, up to 255 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Depends on local-auth-method such as:Psk:local tunnel ip address 
Cert-auth: subject of the local certificate
